name: dev-toolbox
description: 集成常用开发者工具的桌面应用

scripts.build: vue-tsc && vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run rename-electron-files && electron-builder
scripts.build:win: vue-tsc && vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run rename-electron-files && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: vue-tsc && vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run rename-electron-files && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: vue-tsc && vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run rename-electron-files && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:dev: vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run rename-electron-files && npx electron .
scripts.rename-electron-files: cd dist-electron/electron && if [ -f main.js ]; then mv main.js main.cjs; fi && if [ -f preload.js ]; then mv preload.js preload.cjs; fi
scripts.electron:build: vue-tsc && vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && electron-builder
